verses.name: Daniel 11:42
verses.text: He shall stretch forth his hand also upon the countries: and the land of Egypt shall not escape.

verses.name: Daniel 11:43
verses.text: But he shall have power over the treasures of gold and of silver, and over all the precious things of Egypt: and the Libyans and the Ethiopians shall be at his steps.

verses.name: Daniel 11:44
verses.text: But tidings out of the east and out of the north shall trouble him: therefore he shall go forth with great fury to destroy, and utterly to make away many.
